players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Be cautious of Diana, as they are the mafioso I investigated last night."
Diana: "Alice is lying. I investigated Bob last night and he is the detective. Why would you make up such a claim, Alice?"
Bob: "Alice, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Diana first night? That seems odd. Diana, if you're the detective, why investigate me, a villager, instead of a more suspicious target?"

Bob: "Alice and Diana, one of you is lying. Since there's only one detective, I'm inclined to believe the first claim. Alice investigated Diana as mafia, which makes more sense than Diana investigating me, a villager, on night 1."

Diana: "Bob, if you're a villager, why are you so quick to side with Alice without proof? I investigated you to confirm your role, as a good detective would. Alice is the real mafioso trying to frame me."
